nodes.text: Sarvchi was a planet of the Chiss Ascendancy in the Unknown Regions. It was home of the Chaf family, one of the Chiss Ruling Families. Like other homeworlds of Ruling Families, Sarvchi was located on the Path of the Houses. It was a neutral world where lived the few non-Chiss that populated the Ascendancy. Chaf'orm'bintrano sent a message to the Jade Sabre from Sarvchi in 22 ABY.
